member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncAreaSymbolizationType
member.summary: The list of area features symbolization settings.
member.remarks: This is used to specify whether areas should be symbolized with plain or traditional symbols.

member.name: F:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncAreaSymbolizationType.Plain
member.summary: Use plain symbols.

member.name: F:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncAreaSymbolizationType.Symbolized
member.summary: Use traditional symbols.

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncCell
member.summary: An ENC cell object.

remarks.para: A single ENC (Electronic Navigational Chart) data source.

It can take some time to load an ENC cell. Cells should be processed by the runtime before they are used for navigation, especially when loading from large ENC exchange sets. Loading an ENC cell with an accomplishes this by causing the runtime to build the SENC database for that cell. Subsequent loads will read from the internal SENC database for improved performance.

member.name: M:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncCell.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified path.
member.param: The path to the S-57/ENC (extension .000) file.
member.remarks: This constructor should be used for loading an individual cell independent of any exchange set. If the ENC cell was delivered as part of an exchange set, use the constructor instead. When an ENC cell is constructed from the path directly, updates (*.001, *.002, etc.) that are part of the associated exchange set (if there is one) will not be applied.

member.name: M:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncCell.#ctor(Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDataset)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified dataset.
member.param: An instance previously obtained from a

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncCell.LoadWarnings
member.summary: Returns a collection of ENC warnings encountered during load.
member.remarks: Note that, despite the property name being "LoadWarnings", the type of the warnings are exceptions. This is intentional. The warnings themselves are, at this time, SSE codes and their accompanying text, as defined by the S-63 specification.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncCell.Dataset
member.summary: Gets the ENC data set associated with the ENC cell.
member.remarks: Returns null if the ENC cell was loaded from a path.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncCell.Path
member.summary: Gets the path associated with the ENC cell.

member.summary: A switch between S-52 color schemes.
member.remarks: The S-52 standard allows for switching between three color modes.

member.summary: Day

member.summary: Dusk

member.summary: Defines an ENC dataset.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDataset.Description
member.summary: Gets the description of the ENC dataset.
member.returns: The description of the ENC dataset.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDataset.Extent
member.summary: Gets the extent of the ENC dataset.
member.returns: The extent of the ENC dataset.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDataset.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the ENC dataset.
member.returns: The name of the ENC dataset.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDataset.VolumeName
member.summary: Gets the volume name of the ENC dataset.
member.returns: The volume name of the ENC dataset.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDataset.IsAuthorized
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the data set is authorized
member.remarks: If the underlying data is S-57, then this function returns true. If the underlying data is S-63 and there is a valid cell permit, this function returns true. If the underlying data is S-63 and there is no valid cell permit, this function returns false.
member.returns: A bool returning whether the dataset is authorized

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplayCategories
member.summary: An ENC Display Categories object. Contains three categories.
member.remarks: The S-52 standard allows for toggling three display categories.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplayCategories.DisplayBase
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the S52 "displaybase" display category is enabled.
member.remarks: "displaybase" contains a subset of the objects in "standard".

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplayCategories.OtherDisplay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the S52 "other" display category is enabled.
member.remarks: The "other" category contains all objects that are not enabled by default in "Standard Display".

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplayCategories.StandardDisplay
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the S52 "standard" display category is enabled.
member.remarks: Once an object has been added to or removed from display, the display is no longer showing the "Standard Display". This will not be reflected by this property.

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplayDepthUnits
member.summary: A switch between units for depth.
member.remarks: Change the unit of depth for soundings and contours.

member.name: F:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplayDepthUnits.Meters
member.summary: Meters

member.summary: Feet

member.name: F:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplayDepthUnits.Fathoms
member.summary: Fathoms

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncEnvironmentSettings
member.summary: Defines the ENC environment settings.
member.remarks: ENC environment settings apply runtime-wide.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncEnvironmentSettings.Default
member.summary: Gets the global instance of the .

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncEnvironmentSettings.DisplaySettings
member.summary: Gets the ENC display settings, which allows selection of mariner, viewing group, and text group visibility settings.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncEnvironmentSettings.SencDataPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the SENC resource files.

remarks.para: If null, a temporary path is used.
The SENC path should always be set explicitly before using ENC functionality.
SENC files can take a long time to generate. The default temp path may not preserve generated files between app runs or over time.
SENC files should not be backed up, and care should be taken to ensure that this path will not be included in backups. SENC files are machine- and build-specfic.

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncExchangeSet
member.summary: Defines an ENC exchange set.
member.remarks: ENC exchange sets consist of one or more datasets and a catalog file (CATALOG.031).

member.name: M:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncExchangeSet.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The paths to ENC exchange sets to be loaded.
member.remarks: An ENC exchange set can be loaded with the path to a single exchange set and zero or more update exchange sets. If an exchange set which only contains updates is loaded, the corresponding exchange set with the base cells must be loaded simultaneously.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncExchangeSet.LoadWarnings
member.summary: Returns a collection of ENC warnings encountered during load.
member.remarks: Note that, despite the property name being "LoadWarnings", the type of the warnings are exceptions. This is intentional. The warnings themselves are, at this time, SSE codes and their accompanying text, as defined by the S-63 specification.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncExchangeSet.Datasets
member.summary: Gets the ENC datasets available in the exchange set.
member.remarks: The ENC exchange set's datasets can be used to create s, which can then be used to populate s.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncExchangeSet.Paths
member.summary: Gets a list of the paths of the ENC exchange set.
member.remarks: An ENC exchange set can be loaded with the path to a single exchange set and zero or more update exchange sets. If an exchange set which only contains updates is loaded, the corresponding exchange set with the base cells must be loaded simultaneously.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncExchangeSet.Readme
member.summary: Gets the path to the ENC exchange set's Readme file.
member.returns: The path to the Readme file of the ENC exchange set.

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncFeature
member.summary: An ENC feature.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncFeature.Geometry
member.summary: Gets the of this ENC feature.
member.remarks: ENC feature geometry can't be set; attempting to set will throw an exception.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncFeature.Acronym
member.summary: Gets the acronym for the ENC feature.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncFeature.Description
member.summary: Gets the description for the ENC feature.

member.name: M:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncFeature.GetAttributeDescription(System.String)
member.summary: Get the description of an ENC feature acronym.
member.remarks: Use this to convert an attribute's Key into a human-readable representation.
member.returns: Returns the description of the given key acronym. If that acronym does not exist, this function returns the key passed in.

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings
member.summary: An ENC mariner settings object for controlling the rendering of ENC layers.

member.name: M:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.ResetToDefaults
member.summary: Resets all ENC mariner settings.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.AreaSymbolizationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the area symbolization type (plain/symbolized). This controls the line symbol style for areas.
member.remarks: Defaults to symbolized.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.DisplayCategories
member.summary: Gets the ENC display categories object, which contains categories base, standard, and other.

remarks.para: This can be used to configure display settings for categories of objects.
All display categories are enabled by default.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.ColorScheme
member.summary: Gets or sets the color scheme (day/dusk/night).
member.remarks: Defaults to day.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.DeepContour
member.summary: Gets or sets the deep water contour depth in meters.

remarks.para: This must be greater than or equal to the safety contour value. An exception will be thrown otherwise.
When four (rather than two) depth shades are used, this controls the boundary between safe and deep areas.
Defaults to 30 meters.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.LabelContours
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the depth contour labels, including safety contour labels.

remarks.para: This is viewing group 33021, 33022 per IHO S-52 Annex A.
Defaults to true, meaning the depth contour labels will be displayed.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.LabelSafetyContours
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the safety contour labels.
member.remarks: Defaults to true, meaning the safety contour labels will be displayed.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.TwoDepthShades
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether two or four depth shades will be used; two is the default.
member.value: true for two, false for four.
member.remarks: Defaults to true, meaning two depth shades will be used.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.DisplayDepthUnits
member.summary: Gets or sets the depth units (meters/feet/fathoms) for display.
member.remarks: Defaults to meters.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.HonorSCAMIN
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the 'SCAMIN' (scale min) S-57 feature attribute will be used.

remarks.para: If disabled, all ENC features will be rendered regardless of scale.
Defaults to true, meaning the scale min attribute will be respected.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.IsolatedDangers
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display isolated dangers in shallow water.

remarks.para: This is viewing group 24020, 24050 per IHO 2-52 Annex A.
Defaults to false, meaning isolated dangers will not be shown in shallow water.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.LowAccuracy
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use low accuracy symbols (CATZOC).

remarks.para: This is viewing group 31010 per IHO S-52 Annex A.
Defaults to true, meaning vectors marked as 'low accuracy data' will be symbolized differently.
When low accuracy is set to false, low accuracy data will be visually indistinguishable from other data.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.DisplayNOBJNM
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the national name attribute on S-57 features.

remarks.para: This is text group 31 per IHO S-52 Annex A.
Defaults to true, meaning national names will be displayed.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.PointSymbolizationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the S-52 point feature symbolization type (simplified/paperchart).

remarks.para: Paperchart symbolization is based on traditional paper charts. Simplified symbols are more compact and visible.
Defaults to paperchart.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.DataQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display data quality (M_QUAL) for S-57 features.
member.remarks: Defaults to false, meaning quality of data will not be displayed.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.SafetyContour
member.summary: Gets or sets the depth of the safety contour in meters.

remarks.para: The safety contour separates safe from unsafe areas.
Defaults to 30 meters.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.ShallowContour
member.summary: Gets or sets the depth of the shallow contour in meters.

remarks.para: This must be less than or equal to the safety contour value. An exception will be thrown otherwise.
When four (rather than two) depth shades are used, this value controls the separation between shallow and unsafe areas.
Defaults to two meters.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncMarinerSettings.ShowShallowDepthPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the shallow depth pattern will be symbolized.
member.remarks: Defaults to false, meaning the shallow depth pattern will not be symbolized.

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncPointSymbolizationType
member.summary: The list of point features symbolization settings.
member.remarks: This is used to specify whether point features should be symbolized with simplified or paperchart symbols.

member.name: F:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncPointSymbolizationType.PaperChart
member.summary: Use Paperchart symbols.

member.name: F:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncPointSymbolizationType.Simplified
member.summary: Use simplified symbols.

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplaySettings
member.summary: ENC display settings object container for a group of finer-grained settings.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplaySettings.MarinerSettings
member.summary: Gets the S-52 display properties for the environment.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplaySettings.TextGroupVisibilitySettings
member.summary: Gets the S-52 text group properties for the environment.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncDisplaySettings.ViewingGroupSettings
member.summary: Gets the S-52 view group properties for the environment.

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings
member.summary: S-52 text group properties object.

member.name: M:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.ResetToDefaults
member.summary: Resets each S-52 text group property to its respective default.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.BerthNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "berth number" text group should be visible.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls text group 29, which includes OBJNAM from BERTHS and ACHBRT.
member.returns: true if text group berth number visibility should be visible.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.CurrentVelocity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "current velocity" text group should be visible.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls text group 30, which includes CURVEL.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.GeographicNames
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "geographic names" text group should be visible.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls text group 26, which includes OBJNAM from ACHARE, BRIDGE, BUAARE, BUISGL, DOCARE, FAIRWY, LNDARE, LNDMARK, LNDRGN, SEAARE, TIDEWY, and PILBOP.
member.returns: true if the text group geographic names should be visible.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.HeightOfIsletOrLandFeature
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "height of islet or land feature" text group should be visible.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls text group 28, which includes HEIGHT of LNDARE.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.ImportantText
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "important text" text group should be visible.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls text groups 10 and 11.
member.returns: true if the text group important text should be visible.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.LightDescription
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "light descriptions" text group should be visible.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls text group 23.
member.returns: true if the text group light descriptions should be visible.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.MagneticVariationAndSweptDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "magnetic variation and swept depth" text group should be visible.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls text group 27, which includes MAGVAR, VALMAG, SWPARE, and DRVAL1.
member.returns: true if the magnetic variation and swept depth text group should be visible.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.NamesForPositionReporting
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "names for position reporting" text group should be visible.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls text group 21.
member.returns: true if the NamesForPositionReporting text group should be visible.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.NatureOfSeabed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "nature of seabed" text group should be visible.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls text group 25, which includes SBDARE and NATSUR.
member.returns: true if the text group NatureOfSeabed should be visible.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncTextGroupVisibilitySettings.NoteOnChartData
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the "note on chart data" text group should be visible.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls text group 24.
member.returns: true if the NoteOnChartData text group should be visible.

member.name: T:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings
member.summary: S-52 viewing group properties object.

member.name: M:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.ResetToDefaults
member.summary: Resets all ENC viewing group settings.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.AllIsolatedDangers
member.summary: Gets or sets the "all isolated dangers" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 13, which includes viewing groups 34050 and 34051.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.ArchipelagicSeaLanes
member.summary: Gets or sets the "archipelagic sea lanes" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 9, which includes viewing group 26260.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.BoundariesAndLimits
member.summary: Gets or sets the "boundaries and limits" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 4, which includes viewing groups 23030, 26050, 26220, 26240, and 26250.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.BuoysBeaconsAidsToNavigation
member.summary: Gets or sets the "buoys, beacons, aids to navigation" viewing group setting.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.BuoysBeaconsStructures
member.summary: Gets or sets the "buoys, beacons, structures" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 3.1, which includes viewing groups 21010, 21020, 22200 - 22240, 27000-27050, 27080, 27200 – 27230, 27030, and 27060.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.ChartScaleBoundaries
member.summary: Gets or sets the "chart scale boundaries" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 6, which includes viewing group 21030.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.DepthContours
member.summary: Gets or sets the "depth contours" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 15, which includes viewing group 33020.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.DryingLine
member.summary: Gets or sets the "drying line" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 2, which includes viewing group 22010.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.Lights
member.summary: Gets or sets the "lights" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 3.2, which includes viewing group 27070.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.MagneticVariation
member.summary: Gets or sets the "magnetic variation" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 14, which includes viewing group 31080.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.OtherMiscellaneous
member.summary: Gets or sets the "other miscellaneous" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 18, which includes viewing group 30000-39999.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.ProhibitedAndRestrictedAreas
member.summary: Gets or sets the "prohibited and restricted areas" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 5, which includes viewing groups 2600, 26010, and 26040.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.Seabed
member.summary: Gets or sets the "seabed" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 16, which includes viewing groups 34010, 34020, and 33040.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.ShipsRoutingSystemsAndFerryRoutes
member.summary: Gets or sets the "ships' routing systems and ferry routes" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 8, which includes viewing groups 25010-25060.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.SpotSoundings
member.summary: Gets or sets the "spot soundings" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 11, which includes viewing group 33010.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.StandardMiscellaneous
member.summary: Gets or sets the "standard miscellaneous" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 10 under the "standard display" viewing group, which includes all objects not covered by viewing groups 20000-29999.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.SubmarineCablesAndPipelines
member.summary: Gets or sets the "submarine cables and pipelines" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 12, which includes viewing groups 34030 and 34070.

member.name: P:Esri.ArcGISRuntime.Hydrography.EncViewingGroupSettings.Tidal
member.summary: Gets or sets the "tidal" viewing group setting.
member.remarks: Per IHO S-52 Annex A, controls viewing group layer 17, which includes viewing groups 33050 and 33060.
